statements: SELECT * FROM match_results WHERE team1_name = 'Team A'
SELECT team1_name, team2_name, match_date FROM match_results ORDER BY match_date DESC
SELECT team1_name, team2_name, team1_score, team2_score FROM match_results WHERE winner = 'Team A'
SELECT match_id, team1_name, team2_name, winner FROM match_results ORDER BY match_id ASC
SELECT * FROM match_results WHERE team2_score > team1_score
SELECT * FROM match_results WHERE team1_score > team2_score ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT team1_name, team2_name, winner FROM match_results WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY team1_name ASC, team2_name DESC;
SELECT match_id, team1_name, team2_name, team1_score + team2_score AS total_score FROM match_results WHERE winner IS NOT NULL ORDER BY total_score DESC;
SELECT team1_name, team2_name, winner FROM match_results WHERE team1_score < team2_score AND match_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY match_id;
SELECT DISTINCT winner FROM match_results WHERE match_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT match_id, team1_name, team2_name, winner FROM match_results
SELECT * FROM match_statistics
SELECT team1_name, team2_name, team1_score, team2_score FROM match_results
SELECT match_date, winner FROM match_results ORDER BY match_date DESC
SELECT team1_name, team2_name, total_shots, shots_on_target FROM match_results JOIN match_statistics ON match_results.match_id = match_statistics.match_id
SELECT match_id, team1_name, team2_name, match_date FROM match_results WHERE match_id = 1;
SELECT team1_name, team2_name, winner FROM match_results WHERE winner IS NOT NULL;
SELECT team1_name, team2_name, team1_score, team2_score FROM match_results WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT team1_name, team2_name, winner FROM match_results WHERE team1_score > team2_score AND winner = team1_name;
SELECT match_id, total_shots, shots_on_target, corners FROM match_statistics WHERE possession > 50 ORDER BY match_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM MatchResults;
SELECT winner_id, losing_score, winner_id, loser_id FROM MatchResults ORDER BY winner_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, wins, losses FROM PlayerStatistics WHERE wins > 10;
SELECT match_id, player_id, performance_rating FROM MatchAnalysis WHERE performance_rating > 8.0;
SELECT match_id, winner_id, losing_score FROM MatchResults ORDER BY losing_score ASC;
SELECT match_id, winner_id, loser_id, winning_score, losing_score FROM MatchResults ORDER BY match_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT player_id, matches_played, wins, losses FROM PlayerStatistics WHERE wins > 50 ORDER BY wins DESC, losses ASC
SELECT match_id, winner_id, losing_score, winning_score FROM MatchResults INNER JOIN PlayerStatistics ON MatchResults.winner_id = PlayerStatistics.player_id WHERE matches_played >= 20
SELECT player_id, performance_rating FROM MatchAnalysis WHERE performance_rating > 9.5 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM MatchResults WHERE winning_score > losing_score ORDER BY winning_score - losing_score DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM MatchResults ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT winner_id, loser_id, winner_score, loser_score FROM MatchResults WHERE winner_score > loser_score;
SELECT player_name, team_id FROM Players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT team_name FROM Teams WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT player_id, serve_aces, serve_errors, attacks, blocks FROM MatchStatistics WHERE match_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM MatchResults WHERE winner_score > loser_score ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT Players.player_name, Teams.team_name FROM Players JOIN Teams ON Players.team_id = Teams.team_id;
SELECT Teams.team_name, COUNT(Players.player_id) AS total_players FROM Teams LEFT JOIN Players ON Teams.team_id = Players.team_id GROUP BY Teams.team_name;

SELECT MatchResults.match_id, MatchStatistics.player_id, MatchStatistics.serve_aces FROM MatchResults JOIN MatchStatistics ON MatchResults.match_id = MatchStatistics.match_id WHERE MatchStatistics.serve_aces > 5;
SELECT MatchResults.match_id, Players.player_name, Teams.team_name FROM MatchResults JOIN Players ON MatchResults.winner_id = Players.player_id JOIN Teams ON Players.team_id = Teams.team_id;
SELECT * FROM MatchResults ORDER BY match_date DESC, match_time ASC
SELECT team1_name, team2_name, team1_score, team2_score FROM MatchResults WHERE winner IS NOT NULL
SELECT team_name, player_name FROM Players INNER JOIN Teams ON Players.team_name = Teams.team_name
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists FROM Players INNER JOIN PlayerStats ON Players.player_id = PlayerStats.player_id

SELECT team_name, SUM(goals_scored) AS total_goals FROM Players INNER JOIN Teams ON Players.team_name = Teams.team_name INNER JOIN PlayerStats ON Players.player_id = PlayerStats.player_id GROUP BY team_name
SELECT match_id, match_date, team1_name, team2_name, team1_score, team2_score FROM MatchResults WHERE winner IS NULL;
SELECT player_id, player_name, team_name FROM Players ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT team1_name, team2_name, team1_score, team2_score, winner FROM MatchResults WHERE match_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, goals_scored, assists FROM Players JOIN PlayerStats ON Players.player_id = PlayerStats.player_id WHERE goals_scored > 5 AND assists > 3;

SELECT team_name, SUM(goals_scored) AS total_goals, AVG(possession_team1) AS avg_possession FROM Players JOIN Teams ON Players.team_name = Teams.team_name JOIN PlayerStats ON Players.player_id = PlayerStats.player_id GROUP BY team_name ORDER BY total_goals DESC;
